summary: A new Helmet from the Dark Fantasy manga Berserk.
descriptionHtml:
Berserker Wolf Helmet Mod - Ver. 1.0 by Eferas

First of all, I'm not the author of any of these meshes and textures. The original author and owner is Duster451, who kindly agreed to share this work with the comunity.

You can find his Blog at this link --> http://1khz.me.uk/Blog/

Now, what this mod does is adding a new helmet to the game, inspired by the Dark Fantasy Manga "Berserk" by Kentaro Miura.

You can forge it under the dwarven category (no perks required) with 2 dwarven ingots and 1 ebony ingot, then update it with 1 ebony ingot. It has daedric helmet stats, since it's a demoniac armor created by dwarfs.

Problems with this mod: the helmet clips a little with the character's head, I can't fix it because I'm not a 3D modeler, sorry. But there aren't any problems if you use the custom race mod by Bagserk, that add all Berserk races to the game.

You can find his mod here --> http://bagserk.blogspot.it/2012/09/berserk-races-for-skyrim-with-face.html

How to install:
Copy everything and past in your data folder.

How to unistall:
Delete esp and files.

Permits: you MUST ask me or Duster451 before doing anything.

Credits: all credits go to Duster451, thanks a lot! http://1khz.me.uk/Blog/
author: Eferas e Duster451
